channel.title: @how do i change the exp rate?@
channel.description: could someone tell me how to change the exp rate for skills please?

item.title: @how do i change the exp rate?@
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

for noncombat search for.

Like

Here is for WC

Woodcutting("tree", 1, (500*playerLevel[8]), 995, 15000, objectID, objectX, objectY, 875); break;
Change the 500 to whatever you want the XP to be

Read full topic
item.source: @how do i change the exp rate?@

item.title: @how do i change the exp rate?@
item.dc:creator: @You_Are_Sick You Are Sick
item.description:
@You_Are_Sick wrote:

[quote=“Tenacious T, post:3, topic:199005”]Go into client.java

{ sendMessage("You gain some attack exp"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(422); addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[0]), 0); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Change add skillxp to whatever you want :)[/quote]
And how for noncombat/

Read full topic
item.source: @how do i change the exp rate?@

item.title: @how do i change the exp rate?@

@Tenacious_T wrote:

Go into client.java

{ sendMessage("You gain some attack exp"); actionTimer = 10; setAnimation(422); addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[0]), 0); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Change add skillxp to whatever you want
